title: Bussmann and Quantick Kingsize (BBC radio comedy)
description:
Bussmann and Quantick Kingsize


First performed live in 1998. Sketches, monologues and weird soup, written and performed by Jane Bussmann and David Quantick (writers of Brass Eye, South Park and Blue Jam). With Peter Serafinowicz, Emma Clarke, and Steve Brody.



Technical:

This was recorded from the BBC iPlayer using rtmpdump, and cut using avconv 0.8.10, using the following commands:

avconv -ss 36 -i b00757wk.flv -codec copy -t 00:28:37 1.m4a
avconv -ss 29 -i b007587z.flv -codec copy -t 00:27:47.5 2.m4a
avconv -ss 20 -i b044vhlq.flv -codec copy -t 00:27:53 3.m4a
avconv -ss 32.5 -i b044w4v4.flv -codec copy -t 00:27:31.5 4.m4a
avconv -ss 43 -i b045gdqt.flv -codec copy -t 00:27:58 5.m4a
